name: Emotional Bubbles
description:
Fight a whole army of emotional bubbles using your trusty machine gun. Use your tongue to grab the bubble and turn it into an orb that isn't so emotional. Collect the orbs and win the game.

Made for Lost Relic Games - GAME JAM 2022

Space : Jump

A+D : Move left and right

Left-click : Shoot

Right-click : Connect tongue to enemy 

Special thanks for the following unity assets:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/free-2d-mega-pack-177430
